title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 731.14 - Decisions and orders; costs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 731.14 - Decisions and orders; costs

State Regulations
(a) A
decision and order of this court determining an appeal or a motion shall be
drafted by the court and shall be entered in the Office of the Chief Clerk. Such an order shall be deemed entered on the date upon which it was
issued. (b) Costs and disbursements
upon any appeal or motion shall be allowed only as directed by order of this
court. In the absence of a contrary direction, the award by this court of costs
shall be deemed to include disbursements, pursuant to CPLR 8301. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
731.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
